posts.name: SHIVAM AGARWAL
posts.cooked:
Hello All!
I had registered for TDS back in Jan 2024 term, but owing to some personal issues, I could not complete it and therefore got an I (incomplete grade).

This semester (Sep 2024), I again paid the whole fee for repeating the course, however, when I click on the course tab, it redirects me to the dashboard stating that course not registered.

Can someone please help me out with this.

posts.name: Monica Vaze
posts.cooked: Even I an unable to access the portal content. It says you are not registered to this course.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
@SHIVAM_AGARWAL @23ds2000023

We are looking into it. I have informed the TDS team and operations.

Kind regards

posts.name: D.A
posts.cooked: same goes with me too registered it for the first time n not able to access

posts.name: Anirudh Venkateswaran
posts.cooked:
same issue here too registered for the first time but cannot access the course

it says " you are not subscribed to this course redirecting you to the dashboard "

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
These are operational issues. Please send a support ticket to the support help desk.

https://study-supportdesk.freshdesk.com/support/login

I have informed from my end @jkmadathil @Narayanan.POD , but since these impact individual students, recording your complaint in the support desk ticketing system is the best way.

Kind regards

posts.name: Anirudh Venkateswaran
posts.cooked:
I checked on it now and Its working for me now

Thanks

posts.name: Bijoy Biju Varghese
posts.cooked: I am also not able to Access TDS course content, It was saying not subscribed to the course and redirects to the dashboard earlier. Now it is keep on loading and showing blank page

posts.name: Monica Vaze
posts.cooked: Exactly same happening with me. I have raised a ticket for this. Hope it gets resolved soon.

posts.name: Monica Vaze
posts.cooked:
I am able to access the content now.
@22f2000816 can you please try your portal?
